The figures displayed on the voting portal also reflect this change. Gauntlet and RiskDAO do not currently have any MKR delegated to their active platform. Overall Compensation for November 2022: 103,230 DAI Summary - Calculations - Processed MKR-by-Day - Raw MKR-by-Day   Payout for October 2022: 111,712 DAI  Payout for September 2022: 120,490 DAI  3-month Annualized Compensation: 1,341,728 DAI   Credits Huge thanks to @piotr.klis from the Data Insights CU for fetching the raw data, updating the feed to account for delegate contract migration, and generally putting up with GovAlpha’s neediness.  Comments  Accommodation for Recognized Delegate Contract Migration Per MIP61c4 when Recognized Delegates are involved in a contract migration there is a 30-day window where the amount of MKR delegated to their old and new contract is counted for the purposes of compensation in order to provide stability for Recognized Delegates.  Calculations around starting / leaving delegates  Recognized Delegates’ MKR weight is measured once per day, and this is used to generate an average for the month. The amount of MKR Recognized Delegates are credited with for compensation calculations is an average of the days for which they were active for the month. The average referenced in the previous point counts MKR delegated on each day to a maximum of 10,000 MKR in line with the intention to cap the benefit from delegated MKR at the upper threshold of 10,000 MKR. We apply pro-rata scaling to compensation for Recognized Delegates that were only active for a part of the month.   Recognized Delegate Compensation Calculations MIP 61 was ratified during the March 2022 Governance Cycle. This MIP contains details of the calculations used to determine Recognized Delegate compensation as well as information about the Performance Modifier. MIP4c3-SP24 passed in the September Governance Cycle. This has amended MIP61 to use a 120-day rolling window for calculation of delegation metrics.  Distribution Recognized Delegate compensation will be distributed as part of the next Executive Vote, scheduled for 2022-12-09.  Previous Recognized Delegate Compensation Breakdowns  October 2022 September 2022 August 2022 July 2022 June 2022 May 2022 April 2022 March 2022 February 2022 January 2022 December 2021 November 2021   cc: @Recognized-Delegates

content.content: Hi Selena, To qualify for compensation Recognized Delegates must meet certain minimum requirements of:  Participation in votes Communication of vote reasoning for votes they participated in.  The requirements are defined in MIP61. The listed delegates do not meet these requirements so do not qualify for compensation (hasu and gauntlet - participation and communication; monetsupply just communication). FWIW I think the current system is probably too punitive by looking at a Recognized Delegate’s “lifetime” performance for compensation. The idea behind this was to encourage consistency and long-term performance, but I think we’ve possibly over-tuned things. At present, it can result in leaving Recognized Delegates with a large hole to climb out of if they miss a few votes near the start. Expect some changes to the process being proposed by GovAlpha and others in the near-ish future.     SelenaPotter:  I feel like they should be paid something if they attracted delegations   The issue with basing compensation purely on delegated MKR without qualifiers is that any MKR holder could spin up a delegate contract and farm DAI from the protocol - there needs to be some additional requirements in place to prevent this from happening.     SelenaPotter:  clearly active both in the forum   Forum activity is rewarded separately through sourcecred. Recognized Delegates are also eligible for off-chain incentives for making governance proposals.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
None of the topics listed match

GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Important Note This is the first month using the 120-day rolling window for calculating delegation metrics as per the recently ratified MIP4c2-SP24. Frontier Research LLC 0xA2d55b89654079987CF3985aEff5A7Bd44DA15A8 2,136    London Business School Blockchain 0xB83b3e9C8E3393889Afb272D354A7a3Bd1Fbcf5C 1,974 52.00% metric modifier applied.   Llama 0xA519a7cE7B24333055781133B13532AEabfAC81b 1,839    CodeKnight 0x46dFcBc2aFD5DD8789Ef0737fEdb03489D33c428 269    ONESTONE 0x4eFb12d515801eCfa3Be456B5F348D3CD68f9E8a 108 12 days pro-rata.   pvl 0x6ebB1A9031177208A4CA50164206BF2Fa5ff7416 53 25 days pro-rata. 97.88% metric modifier applied.    Hasu, monetsupply, Jason Yanowitz, and ChicagoDAO did not qualify for compensation this month based on metrics. Gauntlet do not currently have any MKR delegated to their active platform. Overall Compensation for September 2022: 120,490 DAI Summary - Calculations - Processed MKR-by-Day - Raw MKR-by-Day   Payout for August 2022: 117,445 DAI  Payout for July 2022: 121,808 DAI  3-month Annualized Compensation: 1,438,972 DAI   Credits Huge thanks to @piotr.klis from the Data Insights CU for fetching the raw data, updating the feed to account for delegate contract migration, and generally putting up with GovAlpha’s neediness.  Comments  Accommodation for Recognized Delegate Contract Migration Per MIP61c4 when Recognized Delegates are involved in a contract migration there is a 30-day window where the amount of MKR delegated to their old and new contract is counted for the purposes of compensation in order to provide stability for Recognized Delegates. For these delegates, we take the date they announced their new contract addresses on the forum as day 1 of this 30-day period.  Calculations around starting / leaving delegates  Recognized Delegates’ MKR weight is measured once per day, and this is used to generate an average for the month. The amount of MKR Recognized Delegates are credited with for compensation calculations is an average of the days for which they were active for the month. The average referenced in the previous point counts MKR delegated on each day to a maximum of 10,000 MKR in line with the intention to cap the benefit from delegated MKR at the upper threshold of 10,000 MKR. We apply pro-rata scaling to compensation for Recognized Delegates that were only active for a part of the month.   Recognized Delegate Compensation Calculations MIP 61 was ratified during the March 2022 Governance Cycle. This MIP contains details of the calculations used to determine Recognized Delegate compensation as well as information about the Performance Modifier. MIP4c3-SP24 passed in the September Governance Cycle. This has amended MIP61 to use a 120-day rolling window for calculation of delegation metrics.  Distribution Recognized Delegate compensation will be distributed as part of the next Executive Vote, scheduled for 2022-10-12. content.content: Will a 120 days (4 months) rolling metric be applied also in the next few months in the case of @ACREinvest ? She has announced she will stop participating to Governance:    ACREinvest Delegate Platform   ACREinvest will no longer participate in governance at MakerDAO and will let our Delegate Contract expire at the anniversary date.   which ends in (I believe) Dec 2022, se within the four months of the 120days rolling metric. @ACREinvest perhaps, to simplify things, you could just voluntarily renounce to your compensation from now to the end of the year.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Please do not quote us out of context.    ACREinvest Delegate Platform   If the Endgame MIP set is approved, we would view that decision as a final on-chain verified intention to evade and/or disregard laws and accordingly ACREinvest will no longer participate in governance at MakerDAO and will let our Delegate Contract expire at the anniversary date.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving negative feedback on proposal

content.content: ACREinvest:  Please do not quote us out of context.   Thanks for making it clearer. In any case, I encourage you to spontaneously renounce to your compensation from the moment you stop participating in Governance (if the Endgame MIP set is approved). Receiving compensation as a delegate while not participating to governance would just be quite ridiculous, I am sure you agree.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
None of the topics listed match

content.content: iammeeoh:  Receiving compensation as a delegate while not participating to governance would just be quite ridiculous, I am sure you agree.   Depends on what you consider “participation”… If your version of participation is to co-sign unacceptable practices and go-with-the-flow, we are not here for that. We do not believe MIGHT MAKES RIGHT and we are proud to RESIST the corruption in this community by abstaining from votes. Our refusal to participate thusly is ACTUALLY participation. That may go over your head. But so long as ACREinvest votes, abstains, does not support Executive, etc. and communicates reasons in accordance with the rules of this protocol, we are entitled to compensation and we shall gladly accept in on behalf of the minority of MKR holders who have delegated to us for the good fight. ~ Kianga
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Recognized Delegate Compensation - December 2022  Important Note This is the fourth month using the 120-day rolling window for calculating delegation metrics as per the recently ratified MIP4c2-SP24. The figures displayed on the voting portal also reflect this change.  Breakdown - December 2022     Delegate Payment Address Amount (DAI) Notes     Stablenode 0x3B91eBDfBC4B78d778f62632a4004804AC5d2DB0 12,000    schuppi 0xCCffDBc38B1463847509dCD95e0D9AAf54D1c167 12,000    Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC 0x688d508f3a6B0a377e266405A1583B3316f9A2B3 12,000    Flipside Crypto 0x62a43123FE71f9764f26554b3F5017627996816a 11,400    Feedblack Loops LLC 0x80882f2A36d49fC46C3c654F7f9cB9a2Bf0423e1 10,808    Penn Blockchain 0x2165d41af0d8d5034b9c266597c1a415fa0253bd 10,385    mhonkasalo & teemulau 0x97Fb39171ACd7C82c439b6158EA2F71D26ba383d 9,484 Performance Modifier of 82.4% applied   GFX Labs 0xa6e8772af29b29B9202a073f8E36f447689BEef6 8,903    JustinCase 0xE070c2dCfcf6C6409202A8a210f71D51dbAe9473 7,235    London Business School 0xB83b3e9C8E3393889Afb272D354A7a3Bd1Fbcf5C 3,798    CalBlockchain 0x7AE109A63ff4DC852e063a673b40BED85D22E585 3,421    [email protected] 0xdC1F98682F4F8a5c6d54F345F448437b83f5E432 2,851 Performance Modifier of 55.8% applied   Frontier Research LLC 0xA2d55b89654079987CF3985aEff5A7Bd44DA15A8 2,285    Chris Blec 0xa3f0AbB4Ba74512b5a736C5759446e9B50FDA170 1,334    CodeKnight 0x46dFcBc2aFD5DD8789Ef0737fEdb03489D33c428 355    ONESTONE 0x4eFb12d515801eCfa3Be456B5F348D3CD68f9E8a 342    pvl 0x6ebB1A9031177208A4CA50164206BF2Fa5ff7416 56 Performance Modifier of 85.96% applied   ConsenSys 0xE78658A8acfE982Fde841abb008e57e6545e38b3 33     ACREinvest, Hasu, monetsupply, Jason Yanowitz, and ChicagoDAO did not qualify for compensation this month based on metrics. Gauntlet and RiskDAO do not currently have any MKR delegated to their active platforms. HKUST EPI Blockchain has not yet participated in any votes. Overall Compensation for December 2022: 108,690 DAI Summary - Calculations - Processed MKR-by-Day - Raw MKR-by-Day   Payout for November 2022: 103,230 DAI  Payout for October 2022: 111,712 DAI  3-month Annualized Compensation: 1,294,528 DAI   Credits Huge thanks to @piotr.klis from the Data Insights CU for fetching the raw data, updating the feed to account for delegate contract migration, and generally putting up with GovAlpha’s neediness.  Comments  Accommodation for Recognized Delegate Contract Migration Per MIP61c4 when Recognized Delegates are involved in a contract migration there is a 30-day window where the amount of MKR delegated to their old and new contract is counted for the purposes of compensation in order to provide stability for Recognized Delegates.  Calculations around starting / leaving delegates  Recognized Delegates’ MKR weight is measured once per day, and this is used to generate an average for the month. The amount of MKR Recognized Delegates are credited with for compensation calculations is an average of the days for which they were active for the month. The average referenced in the previous point counts MKR delegated on each day to a maximum of 10,000 MKR in line with the intention to cap the benefit from delegated MKR at the upper threshold of 10,000 MKR. We apply pro-rata scaling to compensation for Recognized Delegates that were only active for a part of the month.   Recognized Delegate Compensation Calculations MIP 61 was ratified during the March 2022 Governance Cycle. This MIP contains details of the calculations used to determine Recognized Delegate compensation as well as information about the Performance Modifier. MIP4c3-SP24 passed in the September Governance Cycle. This has amended MIP61 to use a 120-day rolling window for calculation of delegation metrics.  Distribution Recognized Delegate compensation will be distributed as part of the next Executive Vote, scheduled for 2022-11-01.  Previous Recognized Delegate Compensation Breakdowns  November 2022 October 2022 September 2022 August 2022 July 2022 June 2022 May 2022 April 2022 March 2022 February 2022 January 2022 December 2021 November 2021   cc: @Recognized-Delegates

Overall Compensation for July 2022: 121,808 DAI. Summary - Calculations - Processed MKR-by-Day - Raw MKR-by-Day   Payout for June 2022: 73,612 DAI (amount included in Executive Vote, does not include 16 DAI rolled into May)  Payout for May 2022: 78,062 DAI (including 16 DAI rolled over from April)  3-Month Annualized Compensation: 1,093,928 DAI   Credits Huge thanks to @piotr.klis from the Data Insights CU for fetching the raw data and updating the feed to account for delegate contract migration this month.  Comments  Accommodation for Recognized Delegate Contract Migration Per MIP61c4 when Recognized Delegates are involved in a contract migration there is a 30-day window where the amount of MKR delegated to their old and new contract is counted for the purposes of compensation in order to provide stability for Recognized Delegates. For the indicated delegates, we have taken the date they announced their new contract addresses on the forum as day 1 of this 30-day period.  Calculations around starting / leaving delegates  Recognized Delegate’s MKR weight is measured once per day, and this is used to generate an average for the month. The amount of MKR Recognized Delegates are credited with is an average of the days for which they were active for the month. The average referenced in the previous point counts MKR delegated on each day to a maximum of 10,000 MKR in line with the intention to cap the benefit from delegated MKR at the upper threshold of 10,000 MKR. We apply pro-rata scaling to compensation for Recognized Delegates that were only active for a part of the month.   Recognized Delegate Compensation Calculations MIP 61 was ratified during the March 2022 Governance Cycle. This MIP contains details of the calculations used to determine Recognized Delegate compensation as well as information about the Performance Modifier.  Distribution Recognized Delegate compensation will be distributed as part of the next Executive Vote, scheduled for 2022-08-10.  Previous Recognized Delegate Compensation Breakdowns  June 2022 May 2022 April 2022 March 2022 February 2022 January 2022 December 2021 November 2021   cc: @Recognized-Delegates

PVL has not yet been delegated any MKR so does not qualify for compensation. Jason Yanowitz has not yet communicated any voting decisions, so does not technically have a communication metric on which to base compensation. However, they are still within the 7-day period for communicating voting decisions after a vote. Given they have only been active for 3 days, their entitlement for this month would have been 7 DAI. If they complete their communication within 7 days following poll closure, we will roll their 7 DAI into September’s compensation. Overall Compensation for August 2022: 117,445 DAI. Summary - Calculations - Processed MKR-by-Day - Raw MKR-by-Day   Payout for July 2022: 121,808 DAI   Payout for June 2022: 73,612 DAI (amount included in Executive Vote, does not include 16 DAI rolled into May)   3-Month Annualized Compensation: 1,251,460 DAI    Credits Huge thanks to @piotr.klis from the Data Insights CU for fetching the raw data and updating the feed to account for delegate contract migration and generally putting up with GovAlpha’s neediness.  Comments  Accommodation for Recognized Delegate Contract Migration Per MIP61c4 when Recognized Delegates are involved in a contract migration there is a 30-day window where the amount of MKR delegated to their old and new contract is counted for the purposes of compensation in order to provide stability for Recognized Delegates. For the indicated delegates, we have taken the date they announced their new contract addresses on the forum as day 1 of this 30-day period.  Calculations around starting / leaving delegates  Recognized Delegate’s MKR weight is measured once per day, and this is used to generate an average for the month. The amount of MKR Recognized Delegates are credited with is an average of the days for which they were active for the month. The average referenced in the previous point counts MKR delegated on each day to a maximum of 10,000 MKR in line with the intention to cap the benefit from delegated MKR at the upper threshold of 10,000 MKR. We apply pro-rata scaling to compensation for Recognized Delegates that were only active for a part of the month.   Recognized Delegate Compensation Calculations MIP 61 was ratified during the March 2022 Governance Cycle. This MIP contains details of the calculations used to determine Recognized Delegate compensation as well as information about the Performance Modifier.  Distribution Recognized Delegate compensation will be distributed as part of the next Executive Vote, scheduled for 2022-09-07.
